pkgmetadata.longdescription: pgmock######pgmock provides utilities for obtaining and mocking out expressions in Postgres queries. For a quick start anda full tutorial on using pgmock, view the documentation link below.Documentation=============`View the pgmock docs here <http://pgmock.readthedocs.io/>`_.Installation============pgmock can be installed with:: pip3 install pgmockContributing Guide==================For information on setting up pgmock for development and contributing changes, view `CONTRIBUTING.rst <CONTRIBUTING.rst>`_.Primary Authors===============- @wesleykendall (Wes Kendall)- @chris-hartfield (Chris Hartfield)- @dargueta (Diego Argueta)- @VincentLa (Vincent La)Other contributors can be found in the AUTHORS file
